name: Just Jump (itch) (RoeyGil)
description:
Hi everyone.

This is my first serious game and I work very hard on this Project.

I am Roey Gil 13 years old, I build a lot of games in the past but this is the game I invested most in it.

I wish you have fun from the game, and please share it to all the people you know because it helps me a lot.

Write things for improvement in the comments because I want to improve the game.
